terminal.title: Interactive Terminal
terminal.subtitle: Explore my portfolio from the command line. Type 'help' to get started.
terminal.welcome:
Welcome to Luca Alonso's terminal! ğŸš€

Type 'help' to see available commands.

help.title: Available commands:
help.list:
whoami     - Information about me
  ls         - List projects
  cat about.md - Read my biography
  skills     - View my technical skills
  projects   - Explore my projects
  contact    - Contact information
  clear      - Clear terminal
  date       - Current date and time
  echo       - Repeat message
  github     - Open my GitHub
  linkedin   - Open my LinkedIn
  resume     - Download my CV
  matrix     - Matrix effect
  weather    - Current weather
  fortune    - Random motivational quote
  exit       - Exit terminal

about.title: # About Me - Luca Alonso Froeling
about.content:
## ğŸ¯ My Story
I'm a passionate Web Application Development student at ESIC with 
a solid technical background. With two years of prior study in 
Software Engineering, I've acquired a strong foundation in modern 
web development. I love creating innovative solutions and constantly 
learning new technologies.

## ğŸ’¼ Professional Experience
- Full Stack Developer on real projects

- Working with real clients and deadlines

- Web Application Development - ESIC (Currently)

- Modern technology certifications

## ğŸŒŸ Passions
- Innovative software development
